name: Mikogo Session Video Recording
summary: Learn about .BS4 files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: BS4 files are used for storing session histories as well as creating demonstrations. They can be played back in the Mikogo Session Player utility.
NOTE: BS4 files do not contain audio data, and they may not be exported to other video formats in Mikogo.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
